# [Interview #1108: WOR-Omaha, NE, Entry #27](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=1108#27)

#### Macen

Are Heralds Surgebinders without Honorblades?

#### Brandon Sanderson

That's a RAFO. That's a big fat RAFO!
